addition.69: // TODO(user): Deprecate in favor of Enums.stringConverter()
addition.131: * Returns a converter that converts between strings and {@code enum} values
addition.132: * of type {@code enumClass} using {@link Enum#valueOf(Class, String)} and
addition.134: * The converter will throw an {@code IllegalArgumentException} if the
addition.135: * argument is not the name of any enum constant in the specified enum.
addition.140: public static <T extends Enum<T>> Converter<String, T> stringConverter(
addition.146: // TODO(kevinb): remove null boilerplate (convert() will do it automatically)
addition.147: return value == null ? null : Enum.valueOf(enumClass, value);
